events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been classified under the refund category due to the customer's request for money back.
This case has been assigned to agent Lisa M. for further assistance regarding the refund process.
Hello! Iâ€™m Lisa, here to help you with the refund for your incorrect order. Can you please provide your order number?
Could you also send a photo of the item you received to verify the mistake before we proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 456789123 and I have attached the photo of the wrong item here for your reference.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and resolution offer; I appreciate the efficient support on this issue!
The refund has been initiated successfully, and you should see the credited amount in your account shortly.
Hi! Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, the refund appeared today. Thank you for the support and quick handling of my request!
The case is now closed as the refund has been successfully processed and confirmed by the customer.
